Bosch BASF Smart Farming
https://www.smartfarming.ag/index.html
Seems to be solo Germany based but have an MD in North America?
15 employees
German MD - Florian Gwosdz
https://www.linkedin.com/in/florian-gwosdz-3b7a41155/
agromic Know-How by BASF and hardware-competence from Bosch: With our joint venture we connect the best from both worlds. As two word leading companies, we develop innovative solutions for the agricultural sector. These solutions are manufactured on the highest standards, they are reliable, and they really work! Our customers thereby get to use the most efficient solutions in the market while we contribute to a sustainable agriculture.“
Benefits of smart farming:
Embedded software and
connectivity components
System integration competence
Market Access to manufacturers

Subsidiary:
https://www.xarvio.com/gb/en.html
xarvio® Digital Farming Solutions
Better oversight, less risk and more reliability for your planning and decision-making – xarvio™ – Digital Farming Solutions helps you make optimum use of your fields and field zones. Simply and straightforward. You increase efficiency, save time, optimise crop production and crop protection while contributing to sustainable agriculture. powered by BASF
91 Employees based in Cologne –
Looks like this guy runs the show –
